item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR INSERT OUTSIDE MOULDING LH

atten4.ptxt: When installing the front door insert outside moulding, heat the front door outside moulding and front door insert outside moulding using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front door outside moulding or front door insert outside moulding excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the front door outside moulding surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front door outside moulding surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front door outside moulding.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new front door insert outside moulding.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front door outside moulding and a new front door insert outside moulding.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the front door insert outside moulding.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the front door insert outside moulding.

atten4.ptxt: Press the front door insert outside moulding firmly to install it.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR OUTSIDE MOULDING LH

atten4.ptxt: When installing the front door outside moulding, heat the front door panel and front door outside moulding using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front door panel or front door outside moulding excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the front door panel surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front door panel surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front door panel.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new front door outside moulding.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front door panel and a new front door outside moulding.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the front door outside moulding.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the front door outside moulding in the position shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Press the front door outside moulding firmly to install it.
